image.alt: Unique cocktails at Rainbow Room's rooftop cocktail bar.

cards.title: Cocktails
cards.description: Since opening in 1934, Rainbow Room has held a prominent place in American cocktail culture. Bar SixtyFive is where you discover why.

image.alt: Delicious light meals and drinks at Rainbow Room in Manhattan.

cards.title: Dining
cards.description: Perfect for light bites and a few drinks, or a full dinner surrounded by views, the seasonal offerings from our culinary team never fail to inspire.

imageCallout.title: Private Events at Bar SixtyFive
imageCallout.description: Raise the bar. An event hosted at Bar SixtyFive literally and figuratively elevates it above every expectation.

image.alt: Guest at the private event space enjoying the NYC views.

featuredStories.caption: Explore the fashion, food, and culture in the heart of New York City.
